welcome: Greetings! You are now using the mortgage calculator!
queryLoanAmount: How much do you wish to loan?
invalidLoan: Ehm...that is not a valid loan number
queryRate: What is the Annual Percentage Rate?
invalidRate: Sorry, APR needs to be a number
queryYears: How long is the loan duration in years?
queryMonths: and in months? (type in 0 if there are none)
invalidDuration: Enter a valid number for the loan duration
noInterest: We see you have selected to have no interest in your loan
